titleStmt.title: His Maiesties last message, Septemb. 12. 1642 directed to his right trusty and wel-beloved, the Speaker of the House of Peeres with a declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, concerning an insolent letter sent to Mr. Clarke at Craughton neere Brackley in Northamptonshire, from Sir John Biron, Knight, since the inhabitants of that county apprehended divers rebels under his command : whereunto is annexed a coppy of the said letter.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Byron, John Byron, Baron, 1598 or 9-1652.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Also printed with title: His Majesties last message, September 11. 1642 ...
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
